title: Diary of a Bot lane Support
body:
I just hate it when my "ADC" lacks the ability to live without me being in a one meter radius of them, and what's even worse is when they die, they blame you even if you are on the other side of the map. Here is an example of what is feels like to play with one of these "carries". 
If I die, I get blamed. 
If they die, I get blamed.
If we both die; guess who gets blamed? You guessed it, The Support.
I'm not blaming all the ADCs out there, sometimes these people come in the form of a "Support".
This is a small story of the communication between the Support and "ADC"
> {{champion:201}}: I don't think we should go in, Vayne.
> {{champion:67}}: *Goes in*
> {{champion:67}}: *dies*
> {{champion:67}}: wow bram u so bad at leeg  
> {{champion:67}}: reprot dis bram
> {{champion:67}}: hee goes in and getz me deaded

And from this, I always pray to God to give me an ADC that has an IQ above 30.

why is it that every adc i ever have always pushes to the enemy inhib towers then get ganked 1v4
at bot lane? good adc, thats a free baron. gg ez game.

ADCs tend to have the mentality that they are invincible and totally in control just because they are 'carries'. The reason that supports are there are to protect the adc and to decide when to initiate fights in botlane (unless you are an adc with a strong initiate {{champion:22}} ). Heaps of people don't realise this. They also don't realise that even if they are an adc they will have to spend a little bit of gold to place some wards or at the very least use their trinkets. 

Its hilarious that in bronze, many of the adc 'mains' that I have laned with know almost nothing about the support abilities.
I recently had a caitlyn tell me to give her mana (and then get really ♥♥♥♥♥♥ at me) as a sona. 
I had my adc get really pissy at me because I wouldn't heal him as karma.
 Had another adc and jungler annoyed at me because my ult (as lulu) was on too long of a cool down, even with 40% CDR

Occasionally you will find a true adc main who knows about these things, so keep trying to find the one with a higher IQ :D

I spent half of Season 4 being a Supp main and the other half being an ADC main and all I can say now is, don't bother SoloQing a botlane role unless you have God tier patience to deal with the amount of arrogant %%%%ters that play ADC and the amount of sooky %%%%ters that play Supp. Don't forget that it's very likely that the person laning with you was forced into Supp by being last pick or took ADC simply because they don't wanna Supp. /vomit
